segmented_content.title: How to apply
segmented_content.content: Thank you for choosing to study at Ton Duc Thang University (TDTU). Applying to an undergraduate program often requires gathering a range of materials to showcase your background and abilities as a student as well as your interest in higher education. Though it can be quite involved, the process is relatively standard across most institutions in Vietnam. In this article, we've broken down the process ( Click here for the full process) to give you a clearer picture of what you need to do for a complete application to TDTU.
